titleStmt.title: A horse or a New-Yeares-gift to the right worthy and worshipful Sr. Phillip Balfour, knight, colonell of a Scottish regiment in the seruice of the high and mighty lords the States Generall of the United Prouinces / by G. Lawder.
titleStmt.author: Lauder, George, b. ca. 1600.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
